Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Floaty \Float"y\, a. Swimming on the surface; buoyant; light. --Sir W. Raleigh. [1913 Webster]
floaty adj : tending to float on a liquid or rise in air or gas; "buoyant balloons"; "buoyant balsawood boats"; "a floaty scarf" [syn: {buoyant}] [also: {floatiest}, {floatier}]
